attributes.contentHtml: Hey, as an owner of this server I would like to say. DTRNameTags is a freind of a formal owner who we branched away from because he said some really, really bad things. He also tried to ddos us. They go by the name of crent. Schaefer, the old owner, was exposed by Xylo for scamming. I, endy, would like to say I am no way affiliated with these raiding actions. Schaefer was the one involved with cracked plugins and I am currently buying a Strike Practice licence with financial help (im broke). All im trying to do is have a fun place where people can chill man not a business operation. I admit, I am not your average server owner and really don't have time to deal with this stuff, yes I am currently in class. I will most likely give the server to someone who knows what their doing if this continues to happen.

attributes.title: Owner Of Galactic Nodes + Smooth Network Scammers, Raiders, 13 Year Old Owners.
